languages.text: Attacks with this hammer always critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets. The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +80%.
